prompt_base: photorealistic render of a floating cosmic deity, spherical head shape, skin segmented in deep violet and cyan glowing patterns, large black void-like eyes, wearing ornate royal flowing silk robes
feature_prompt: cinematic volumetric lighting, high detail texture on silk robes, glowing energy effect, deep space background, 16k detail
negative_prompt: anime, cartoon, drawing, human proportions, fleshy skin, nose, mouth, ears, childish, simple, plastic, flat color, poorly drawn shape, low contrast
